Introduction

YunSeo is a South Korean singer, rapper, and dancer under BPM Entertainment. She is best known as a member of the girl group BADVILLAIN.

YunSeo is best known for being a contestant on the survival show My Teenage Girl.

On May 16, 2024, YunSeo was revealed as the seventh and last member of BADVILLAIN. The group officially debuted on June 3, 2024, with their debut single album "OVERSTEP".
